Dropbox Mobile Redesign

During the second half of 2017, I led the redesign of Dropbox’s mobile apps to empower rapid work for collaborators on the go. Here are just a few of the changes we shipped.
Dropbox Mobile Redesign add
star star star star star
Champs : Battlegrounds add
star star star star star

Champs : Battlegrounds

Champs : Battlegrounds is a Multiplayer Online Squad Strategy mobile game. It’s available on both tablet and smart phones (iOS + Android). I had lots of fun designing the UI for this game. It was a great opportunity to show that games don’t have to have overly convoluted user interfaces.

Guidebook

The Guidebook app provides a library of guides for events, organizations, and places. Each guide is created by an event organizer or host and is composed of schedules, tools, and useful information. In the past Guidebook focused on simply providing these mobile guides for events like PAX or Pycon. However over the past few years, the types of guides have expanded from events to places, weddings, community centers, and more.
Guidebook add
star star star star star

Arts District Craft & Kitchen add
star star star star star

Arts District Craft & Kitchen

I really enjoyed creating this beatiful web presentation. Arts District Craft and Kitchen is a culmination of giving our best to the community through our food, service, and atmosphere. Tucked inside one of the premier breweries in Nevada, this collaboration project allows us another opportunity to create a memorable setting for you to catch up with friends and make new ones over tasty bites and a refreshing beer.

QuadAngles - Creative Digital Studio

Quad Angles make products with strategy, technology, and creativity to become your brand visible and active. This project is a result of a beautiful collaboration.
QuadAngles - Creative Digital Studio add

Project Details


What can I help you with?


Is this a new project or a redesign for an existing site / brand?


Timeline. When do you need this completed by?
Budget. How much are you planning to invest in the project? (EUR)



Why is the site / redesign / project needed? Who is the audience?
What are the primary objectives and goals (long term and short term) for the project?
Please provide any additional details for the project.

About Me

Hi, my name is Tanja, and I am 26 year old experienced designer and I specialize in Graphic, UI/UX and Web design.
